CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: An alternating copolymer PSFDTBT of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit was designed and synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |

Explanation:
The material name mentioned in the paragraph is "PSFDTBT", which is an alternating copolymer of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |

Explanation:
The only entity in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material name is "PSFDTBT", which is an alternating copolymer of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole units. Other entities such as "an alternating copolymer", "of spirobifluorene and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit", and "was designed and synthesized" do not provide sufficient information to identify a specific material name.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| alternating copolymer |
| PSFDTBT |
| of spirobifluorene |
| and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit |
| unit (implies material) |

Explanation:
The paragraph describes the design and synthesis of a specific type of material, an alternating copolymer, and the components of that material, PSFDTBT, spirobifluorene, and 2′,1′,3′-benzothiadiazole unit. Therefore, all of these entities can be considered material properties.
